programme.title: All Day - It's 1976! - EP1
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1976 & relive that long hot summer of hits. Including Abba, Showaddywaddy, Elton John, Kiki Dee and the early days of punk!

programme.title: The 1976 POWER Hour with Bam! - EP1
programme.desc: 60 minutes of power pop & rock! Earplugs at the ready as we rewind to 1976 with Genesis, Thin Lizzy, Peter Frampton & The Sex Pistols!

programme.title: Great Song - Stupid Title! 1970-79 - EP1
programme.desc: Robin Banks with 30 amazing songs, 30 nonsense titles! Fancy a Dreadlock Holiday or a drive down the 2468 Motorway? This is where to come!

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 70s - EP1
programme.desc: Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!

programme.title: The Hit Songs of Grease! - EP1
programme.desc: All 7 music videos & the theme song from the 1978 movie in order - you know the story, and we're all hopelessly devoted to the tunes! They'll go by like Greased Lightnin'!

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 70s - EP1
programme.desc: Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!

programme.title: Tony's 25 Biggest Pop Groups! - EP1
programme.desc: Pop Groups ruled the 70s & came from all quarters! From Germany's Boney M, Sweden's Abba & the UK's Queen, Police & Showaddywaddy - Tony Blackburn counts down the definitive 25.

programme.title: Groovy Little Numbers! Top 25 - EP1
programme.desc: 25 laid back songs from the first half of the decade - expect long hair, trippy vibes & a few leftover hippies from the 60s!

programme.title: Who Won Wot? 1970-1979 - EP1
programme.desc: From The NME to The Grammys to the coveted 'Rear of the Year' - Mark Goodier's 10 hour marathon of 70s award winners lasts nearly as long as the Oscars!

programme.title: 1977 Unleashed! - EP1
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1977!

programme.title: Groovy Little Numbers! Top 25 - EP1
programme.desc: 25 laid back songs from the first half of the decade - expect long hair, trippy vibes & a few leftover hippies from the 60s!

programme.title: Party Rock Anthems! - EP1
programme.desc: Party pop rock anthems spanning 5 decades! From Queen, Kiss & Aerosmith to Blur, Paramore & The White Stripes.

programme.title: Monsters of Rock! 1990-1999 - EP1
programme.desc: A definitive 6 hour marathon of 90s guitar anthems! From U2 to INXS, Blur to Bon Jovi, Skunk Anansie to Green Day, Metallica to Iron Maiden - 70 rock classics are here, in order!

programme.title: Teenage Kicks: The Misfit Years - EP1
programme.desc: From angsty misfit anthems & teen rebellion, to non-conformers & pure emotional turbulence, these songs reminded us growing up that sometimes it's totally fine to feel different!

programme.title: Rock's Most Streamed of the 00s! - EP1
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with a countdown of bands & artists who've had one rock song that has been viewed over a billion times since the 00s.

programme.title: College Campus Rocks! 1995-2010 - EP1
programme.desc: These rebellious teens rocked every college campus throughout the 90s and 00s. Expect great tunes from Blink-182, Wheatus, Good Charlotte and many more!

programme.title: 50 Rock Heroes of the 00s! - EP1
programme.desc: Claire Sturgess relives her 50 greatest heroes with the rock music that defined the 00s! Blink, MCR, Razorlight & Kings of Leon are all in the top 10 - but who's at number 1?

programme.title: Linkin Park: Fan Favourites - EP1
programme.desc: Starting in 2001, here are the biggest rock songs from Linkin Park!

programme.title: Alex Baker's 30 High School Heroes - EP1
programme.desc: Dust off your old posters as Alex relives 30 era-defining mega bangers that made high school legendary! Featuring Evanescence, No Doubt, Limp Bizkit, Wheatus & many more!

programme.title: Weekend Anthems! - EP1
programme.desc: Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: Turn Up The Pop Punk Anthems! - EP1
programme.desc: Turn up your spreakers to 11 and live life even louder! 1 hour of 00s Pop Punk Anthems in order, featurng Green Day, Blink-182, Sum 41, Bowling For Soup & The All-American Rejects

programme.title: All Killer: 00s Karaoke! - EP1
programme.desc: Turn your amp up to 11 & make your mic roar! Here come 25 of the greatest 00s rock karaoke tracks. Featuring The Killers, Fall Out Boy, Arctic Monkeys & many more!

programme.title: Weekend Anthems! - EP1
programme.desc: Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: Nicky Horne's 30 Hardest Hitters! - EP1
programme.desc: The 30 greatest rock drummers in the world! These are Nicky's hardest hitters featuring Dave Grohl, Tommy Lee, Keith Moon, Ginger Baker, John Bonham but who is his Number 1?

programme.title: Front Men & Women Of Rock - EP1
programme.desc: Standby to pay homage to the best front men and leading ladies that the world of rock has produced! From Grace Slick & Christine McVie to Ozzy Osbourne & Jimi Hendrix.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: 15 Years
programme.desc: After being wrongfully imprisoned for 15 years, piano prodigy Jenny meets Syrian refugee Omar and agrees to accompany him on a talent show. There, Jenny faces the man who framed her and her ex, and she must choose between vengeance and happiness.

programme.title: The Kiss
programme.desc: In 1913 Denmark, young officer Anton grapples with duty and love when he befriends Baron von Løvenskjold's daughter, Edith, confined to a wheelchair. As their bond deepens, Anton is ensnared in a web of promises and lies, torn between pity and true love.

programme.title: Oskar & Lilli: Where No One Knows Us
programme.desc: Chechen siblings Oskar and Lilli face deportation from Austria but are separated in foster care after their mother’s suicide attempt. Meeting in secret, the siblings hold onto hope that they will reunite as a family someday.

programme.title: The Intangible Joy of Love
programme.desc: When the notorious liar Greta unexpectedly kisses the lonesome butcher Alex on the neck at a bus stop, both are unaware that this chance encounter is exactly what they have been missing in their lives

programme.title: Brado
programme.desc: An estranged father-son duo find themselves reunited when the father needs help running the family ranch after an injury. As they train a rebellious horse for a cross-country race, the pair learns to rebuild their relationship and heal from their pain.

programme.title: King of Devil's Island
programme.desc: Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys’ home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom? Based on a true story.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: Love At First Fight
programme.desc: Between his friends and the family business, Arnaud's summer looks set to be a peaceful one. Peaceful until he runs into Madeleine, as beautiful as she is brusque, a concrete block of tensed muscles and doomsday prophecies.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: Puan
programme.desc: When Professor Marcelo Pena finally is about to be appointed Head of the Philosophy Department, the famous and seductive Professor Sujarchuk returns from Europe to claim the kingdom for himself.

programme.title: Oddball (OTO)
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.
